title: SOLD: 1910 Portland, OR V.O. Hammon Behnke-Walker team postcard...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1910 Portland, OR V.O. Hammon Behnke-Walker team postcard...
posts.post_content:
Here is an advertising postcard for the defunct business college located in Portland, Oregon.  It was printed by the V.O. Hammon publishing company, known for producing White Sox postcards of the era.

$SOLD delivered via fortified plain white envelope (PWE) in the conus.  Add $4 if you prefer a bubble mailer with tracking (BMWT)  Payment via PayPal "friends and family."

Please PM if interested.  Thank you.

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/postcards/84084/vohammon[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/postcards/84085/vohammon[/IMG]
